title: [Discussion] Help me choose the right path
content:
I am yet to join through cet , but will soon join pes rr campus  
What is the criteria for branch change from eee to cse  
How hard it is to get the oppurtunity ?

comments.body: Either if u can get in further rounds or after first year priority will be given to ppl with max cgpa to change branch

generally how many ppl opt and successfully change their branch ?

does it depend on the seat vacancy ?

This method is not reliable. It depends on the seats left, some batches had only like 2-3 seats but my batch had more than 20, so it completely depends on luck. If the seats remaining are less you'll need a very high gpa but if theres more seats, more ppl can move so the cutoffs decrease. For my batch we need around 9.45 to get cse rr

How does the seat vacancy be predicted ?  
doesnt pes intake to their max capacity ?
very few get to change their branches even if ther r empty seats like 3-4, with highest of gpas of 9.5+ so yeah its not reliable as depends on too many factors

Some people leave the seat last minute even though they dont get a refund. They seat vacancies cannot be predicted, you have to just wait till 2nd year to know. Or you can try asking the administration dept, idk if theyll tell tho
Same thing but i am now stuck in pes because i took a seat in jee counselling. Ill prolly join EE through kcet too. I really am cooked rnðŸ’”
